p:
The title compound was prepared using the procedure described in Example 2, Step 2 replacing 2,5 dichlorobenzylamine with N-(1-naphthyl)ethane-1,2-diamine..
1H NMR (d 6DMSO, 400MHz) δ 9.61 (1H, t, J=6.0 Hz), 9.17 (1H, d, J=4.2 Hz), 8.93 (1H, s), 8.62 (1H, d, J=8.3Hz), 8.15(1H, d, J=9.0 Hz), 7.84 (1H, dd, J=8.3 and 4.2 Hz), 7.77(1H, d, J=9.1 Hz), 7.50-7.35 (2H, m), 7.10 (2H, t, J=8.2Hz), 7.31 (1H, t, J=8.9Hz), 7.12(1H, d, J=8.2Hz), 6.70 (1H, d, J=7.7Hz), 3.74 (2H, q, J=6.2Hz), 3.47 (2H, t, J=6.6Hz) ppm.
FAB MS calcd for C 21H 18N 4O 2 359 (MH +), found 359.
FAB HRMS exact mass calcd for C 21H 18N 4O 2 359.1503 (MH +), found 359.1495.
